name: search_orders
description: Search orders with multiple filters and date range
sql: SELECT o.id, o.order_date, o.total_amount, c.name as customer_name, c.email FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.id WHERE o.order_date BETWEEN :start_date AND :end_date AND o.total_amount >= :min_amount AND o.status = :status ORDER BY o.order_date DESC
